name: Sartorial
description: Challenge creativity on a daily basis, through a photo sharing platform and also build brand loyalty.

name: Tidal
description: Is there a way tsunami impact could be reduced? This project focused on procedural design for an earthquake and tsunami evacuation.

name: Concerto
description: Concerto is a data visualization prototype. We take a look at the "ingredients" of a tour and see what it takes to make a top grossing concert.

name: Misfit Wearables Internship
description: During the Summer of 2015, I had the opportunity to work at Misfit Wearables as a user experience designer. Here's a sneak peek of some of the work I did.

name: Nomad
description: Going on a vacation involves a lot of planning. Skip the tedious process of planning a vacation and get an experience that's tailored to your taste.
